## Overview

This document tests `logolink` under the different experiments set in the Wolf Sheep Predation model included in NetLogo.

## Set the Environment

### Load Packages

```{r}
library(logolink)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

### Set NetLogo Path

```{r}
Sys.setenv("NETLOGO_HOME" = file.path("~", ".opt", "netlogo-7-0-2"))
```

```{r}
Sys.getenv("NETLOGO_HOME")
```

### Set Model Path

```{r}
model_path <-
  Sys.getenv("NETLOGO_HOME") |>
  file.path(
    "models",
    "Sample Models",
    "Biology",
    "Wolf Sheep Predation.nlogox"
  )
```

## BehaviorSpace Combinatorial

```{r}
experiment <- "BehaviorSpace combinatorial"
```

```{r}
results <-
  model_path |>
  run_experiment(experiment = experiment)
```

```{r}
results |> glimpse()
```
